pkgmetadata.longdescription: OOpgrade========.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/gisce/oopgrade.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/gisce/oopgrade.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/github/gisce/oopgrade/badge.svg?branch=master :target: https://coveralls.io/github/gisce/oopgrade?branch=master.. note:: The API is quite unstable due the active developmentOpenObject upgrade lib forked from `openupgrade project <https://github.com/OCA/OpenUpgrade/tree/5.0/bin/openupgrade>`_and improved and adapted to meed our needs.
